targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(time_start_epoch) as time_sec,
  id as value,
  'stages' as metric
FROM stages
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_start_epoch)
ORDER BY time_start_epoch ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(time_start_epoch) as time_sec,
  duration_total_minutes as value,
  'Total Duration' as metric
FROM stages
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_start_epoch)
ORDER BY time_start_epoch ASC

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  type AS metric,
  depth_shot as value
FROM shots
WHERE 1=1
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  and type = 'charge'
    
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  type AS metric,
  depth_shot as value
FROM shots
WHERE 1=1
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  and type = 'plug'
    
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(time_start_epoch) as time_sec,
  depth_max / 5280 as value,
  'depth_max' as metric
FROM stages
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_start_epoch)
ORDER BY time_start_epoch ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(time_start_epoch) as time_sec,

  'depth_vertical' as metric
FROM stages
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_start_epoch)
ORDER BY time_start_epoch ASC

SELECT

FROM stages

  $__unixEpochFilter(time_start_epoch)
ORDER BY time_start_epoch ASC

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",

FROM shots

  and type = 'charge'
    
ORDER BY timestamp

WHERE 1=1

  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(time_start_epoch) as time_sec,
  duration_total_minutes as value,
  'Total Duration' as metric
FROM stages
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_start_epoch) and
  stage_id = $stage_id
ORDER BY time_start_epoch ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(time_start_epoch) as time_sec,
  depth_max as value,
  'depth_max' as metric
FROM stages
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_start_epoch)
  and stage_id in ($stage_id)
ORDER BY time_start_epoch ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(time_start_epoch) as time_sec,
  depth_vertical as value,

FROM stages

  $__unixEpochFilter(time_start_epoch)

ORDER BY time_start_epoch ASC

FROM stages

  $__unixEpochFilter(time_start_epoch) and

ORDER BY time_start_epoch ASC

SELECT
  s.timestamp AS "time",
  s.type AS metric,
  s.depth_shot as value
FROM shots s
WHERE 1=1
  and $__timeFilter(s.timestamp)
  and s.type = 'charge'
  and s.stage_id = $stage_id
    
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  s.timestamp AS "time",
  s.type AS metric,
  s.depth_shot as value
FROM shots s
WHERE 1=1
  and $__timeFilter(s.timestamp)
  and s.type = 'plug'
  and s.stage_id = $stage_id
    
ORDER BY timestamp

  timestamp AS "time",

ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  type AS metric,
  depth_shot as value
FROM shots
WHERE 1=1
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)

  and stage_id in ($stage_id)
    
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  metric AS metric,
  value as value
FROM data
WHERE 1=1
  and metric = "measured_depth"
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
   and timestamp between  FROM_UNIXTIME(
    (select time_start_epoch 
    from stages as s
    where 1 = 1  
      and s.stage_id = $stage_id
    ))
  and FROM_UNIXTIME((
    select time_end_epoch
    from stages as s
    where 1 = 1
      and s.stage_id = $stage_id
  ))
    
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  metric AS metric,
  value as value
FROM data
WHERE 1=1
  and metric = "voltage"
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  and timestamp between  FROM_UNIXTIME(
    (select time_start_epoch 
    from stages as s
    where 1 = 1  
      and s.stage_id = $stage_id
    ))
  and FROM_UNIXTIME((
    select time_end_epoch
    from stages as s
    where 1 = 1
      and s.stage_id = $stage_id
  ))
    
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  metric AS metric,
  value as value
FROM data
WHERE 1=1
  and metric = "line_tension"
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  and timestamp between  FROM_UNIXTIME(
    (select time_start_epoch 
    from stages as s
    where 1 = 1  
      and s.stage_id = $stage_id
    ))
  and FROM_UNIXTIME((
    select time_end_epoch
    from stages as s
    where 1 = 1
      and s.stage_id = $stage_id
  ))
  
ORDER BY timestamp
